item.title: The Quest to learn GraphQL
item.description: The Quest to learn GraphQL This is just a bunch of notes taken while learning about GraphQL. What is graphql http://graphql.org/ https://www.quora.com/What-problem-does-GraphQL-solve There is graphql in different languages such as golang, nodejs and ruby among others. Ruby https://github.com/rmosolgo/graphql-ruby https://github.com/Shopify/graphql-batch Nodejs Join Monster video Join Monster repo DataLoader Who uses it? Shopify Github Facebook Performance Can we get a sense on how to measure it or what to expect?
